# Love & War

#REDIRECT Love and War
Love & War is the upcoming movie of 2026 directed by Sanjay Leela Bhansali. And it stars Ranbir Kapoor, Alia Bhatt and Vicky Kaushal
Cast

* Alia Bhatt
* Vicky Kaushal
* Orry
* Ali Fazal
